channel.title: Comments on: Netflix lays off people because Silverlight works…

item.title: By: smackfoo
item.dc:creator: smackfoo
item.description:
Nice, especially the “pernicious malware.” tool. And yes, you shouldn't have read the comments.
At least they tried [apparently] to absorb some of the folks in other groups. But, too bad that technology has to make jobs obsolete, especially in this economy.
item.content:encoded:
Nice, especially the “pernicious malware.” tool. And yes, you shouldn’t have read the comments.

At least they tried [apparently] to absorb some of the folks in other groups. But, too bad that technology has to make jobs obsolete, especially in this economy.
